meanings.definition: A person or thing that embodies something.
meanings.sent1: The actors in the play were the embodiers of the characters.
meanings.sent2: The team captain was seen as one of the key embodiers of leadership.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy thought he was the embodier of the big guard dog.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the embodier of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The old tree stood tall, the embodier of wisdom and strength.

meanings.definition: Those who embody a particular quality or idea.
meanings.sent1: The artists were the embodiers of creativity in the community.
meanings.sent2: The protestors were seen as the embodiers of change in society.
meanings.sent3: The toddlers became the embodiers of chaos at the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: His words were the embodiers of hope in times of despair.
meanings.sent5: The stars in the sky were the embodiers of beauty and wonder.
